summary: This is an email chain from September 10, 2021, within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, regarding the submission of monthly unit update reports using a new template. It includes a request to resubmit reports and mentions a Public Corruption Unit update and a report on specially allocated FTE (Full-Time Equivalent).

persons.name: Associate U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting unit update reports be resubmitted using a new template and providing a specially allocated FTE report.

events.title: Request for Unit Update Reports
events.description: An Associate U.S. Attorney emails colleagues requesting the resubmission of monthly unit update reports using a new template that includes a section on specially allocated FTE.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York dated September 10, 2021.
It concerns administrative procedures for monthly unit update reports and the allocation of Full-Time Equivalent (FTE) resources.
An attachment titled 'Public_Corruption_Unit_Septembet_2021.docx' is mentioned, suggesting activity in the Public Corruption Unit.
The correspondence is routine administrative communication and does not directly reference Epstein, his associates, or related case specifics.
